helpArray.help:
Ask Heimdall to teach you his ways... `[command]` is optional.
Use: `!help [command]`
helpArray.ping:
Ping Heimdall and hope he honours you with a response.
Use: `!ping`
helpArray.say:
Ask Heimdall to say something for you.
Use: `!say [message]`
helpArray.embed:
Ask Heimdall to embed something for you. Anything before a "-" is the title, and after it is the description.
Use: `!embed [title]-[description]`
helpArray.start:
Start a particular service.
Use: `!start [service]`
Services to choose from:
- arma
- arma_hc
- teamspeak
- reddit
helpArray.stop:
Stop a particular service.
Use: `!stop [service]`
Services to choose from:
- arma
- arma_hc
- teamspeak
- reddit
